017package org.apache.commons.chain.impl;
018
019import org.apache.commons.chain.Context;
020import org.apache.commons.chain.Filter;
021
022/**
023 * Implementation of {@link Filter} that logs its identifier and
024 * and throws an Exception.
025 *
026 * @author Craig R. McClanahan
027 * @version $Revision$ $Date$
028 */
029public class ExceptionFilter extends ExceptionCommand implements Filter<Context> {
030
031    // ------------------------------------------------------------- Constructor
032
033    public ExceptionFilter() {
034        this("", "");
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * Construct an instance that will log the specified identifier
039     *
040     * @param id1 first identifier to log for this Filter instance
041     * @param id2 second identifier to log for this Filter instance
042     */
043    public ExceptionFilter(String id1, String id2) {
044        super(id1);
045        this.id2 = id2;
046    }
047
048    // -------------------------------------------------------------- Properties
049
050    protected String id2 = null;
051    public String getId2() {
052        return this.id2;
053    }
054    public void setId2(String id2) {
055        this.id2 = id2;
056    }
057
058    // --------------------------------------------------------- Command Methods
059
060    /**
061     * Postprocess command for this Filter
062     */
063    @Override
064    public boolean postprocess(Context context, Exception exception) {
065        log(context, id2);
066        return false;
067    }
068}
